title: Blacklist / whitelist of entities which gripper can attach to

content.raw:
It would be useful to be able to specify a list of entities which a gripper can or can't attach to. 

The specific use case I'm thinking of is to use a gripper element to make a power cable which can be plugged into an outlet. I'd like the plug to "stick" to the outlet after some time of continuous contact, but I don't want the plug to stick to the robot which is handling it, or to other objects it might come in contact with.

I didn't go ahead and implement this because I think this use case could be stretching the gripper entity too far, so I'd like to hear some thoughts first. Maybe a plugin is more appropriate for my use case.
